overview: Four queens, four famous names in Prussian history: Luise, Augusta, \"Vicky\" and Auguste Viktoria. Who were they? Glamorous, rebellious, virtuous, conservative or even scheming? In a panorama from the end of the 18th century to the After the fall of the Prussian monarchy, the documentary opens up a new, female perspective on the military state of Prussia.
title: 4 Queens · Prussia's Most Powerful Women
